Guns Limited, has been considered by the Departments:-1'.........- - ...... Material. Value. Period for which firm licence is desired. Destination,,6 0 Lewis Machine Guns .303, land pattern with 17 Magazines 8 , 59 5.15 . 0 1,277. 0. 0 1,333.10. 0 5 months. Imperial Japanese. Navy.30 Sets spare parts... 60 Tripods for these TOTAL....... JOO.,2 06. 5. 0 The Departments concerned do not desire to oppose the issue of a long term licence in this case; and I propose therefore to issue the licence as requested unless any of my colleagues take objection before Tuesday, 22nd March.In accordance with the Cabinet Decision of the 25th November, 1925, (Cab. 54/2 5) I propose that this long term licence when Issued shall not contain the usual condition that it may be modified or revoked at any time by the Board of Trade without reason given, and that B.S.A. Guns Limited, shall be informed that it will not be withdrawn "save in the event of circumstances of an altogether exceptional character arising which the Board are at present quite unable to foresee".(intd.)
